summary: This package supplies the core abstractions and utilities that underpin Django's GIS database backends. It offers a geometry-to-WKT adapter, a feature‑detection base for assessing spatial capabilities of a backend, a mixin that standardises spatial reference system model behavior, and a generic operations class that handles geometry processing, extents, distance handling, SQL placeholder creation, and SRID management.
business_intent: To provide a reusable, engine‑agnostic foundation that enables Django applications to store, query, and manipulate geographic data across various spatial databases, simplifying backend implementation and ensuring consistent GIS functionality.
